title: React Todo App
description: Build a complete todo application using React hooks and local storage. The app should support adding, editing, deleting, and marking todos as complete.

title: Database Design Project
description: Design and implement a database schema for a library management system. Include ER diagrams and sample queries.

title: Binary Search Implementation
description: Implement binary search algorithm and analyze its time complexity.

title: Algorithm Analysis Essay
description: Write a comparative analysis of sorting algorithms including bubble sort, merge sort, and quicksort.
